mapper.insert: insert into tmall_lease_result( cost_time, error_code, error_message, gmt_current_time, msg_code, msg_info, object, success, lease_type, create_time )values( #{costTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{errorCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorMessage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCurrentTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{msgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{object, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{success, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leaseType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now() )
mapper.select: select id cost_time, error_code, error_message, gmt_current_time, msg_code, msg_info, object, success, lease_ype, create_time from tmall_lease_result where id = #{id}
